text: phu dı ptiseth sraththa tx xallxh hlangcak thi khea di rab sraththa læw(khea ca di rab khwam kriw ca kxallxh) wentæ phu thi thuk bang khab thang«thi hawcı khxng khea peiym pi dwy sraththa tæ phu dı peid hawxk khxng khea dwy kar ptiseth sraththa phwk khea k ca di rab khwam kriw ca kxallxh læa sahrab phwk khea ca di rab kar lngthosʹ xyang mhant
